text: Saint-Hilaire () is a commune in the Doubs department. It is in the Bourgogne- Franche-Comt√© region in eastern France. ==Geography== The commune is north of Roulans. ==Population== ==Related pages== * Communes of the Doubs department ==References== ==Other websites== * Saint-Hilaire on the regional Web site Category:Communes in Doubs
